item.title: Volcano Adventure: Hilo Sightseeing w/ Optional Helicopter Tour
item.description: On this exciting full-day Kilauea volcano adventure, scour fields of jet black lava in search of volcanic activity, from steaming vents to gaping volcanic craters. Trek through the Thurston Lava Tube and In addition to the sights in Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, you’ll also make trips to Rainbow Falls.

image.alt: Volcano Adventure: Hilo Sightseeing w/ Optional Helicopter Tour

item.title: Hilo Shore Excursion: Active Volcano, Lava Tube, Waterfall and Gardens
item.description: Experience some of the Big Island’s top attractions during this day trip to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and the sights around Hilo. Learn all about volcanoes as you marvel at Halema'uma'u crater and explore the massive Kilauea Volcano. Immerse your senses in the beauty of Hilo including a visit to Rainbow Falls and a stop to indulge in local chocolates and island fresh coffee.

image.alt: Hilo Shore Excursion: Active Volcano, Lava Tube, Waterfall and Gardens

item.title: Hilo Shore Excursion: Safari Lava Caves, Falls and Highlights
item.description: When your ship docks in Hilo, use your short time in port to get acquainted with Kilauea, the most active volcano on earth. On this tour, you'll explore lava caves; stroll along the island's newest black-sand beaches; feel the warmth from volcanic hot pools; and feel the mist of Rainbow Falls. You'll pass along the destructive path of the volcano's most recent eruption, your route including round-trip transport from the port or your hotel.

image.alt: Hilo Shore Excursion: Safari Lava Caves, Falls and Highlights

item.title: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and Hilo Highlights Small Group Tour
item.description: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park is unlike anywhere else on the planet, where one of the world’s most active volcanoes sends lava dripping towards the sea, and a towering mountain lies dormant and ready to pop. On this tour of the national park, hear the legends of Madame Pele, the mythical Hawaiian fire goddess, a tour from Hilo to the eastern coastline and climb to the rim of Kilauea volcano. On this tour, your guide customizes the pace and number of sights.

image.alt: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and Hilo Highlights Small Group Tour

item.title: Mauna Kea Arnott's Adventures
item.description: Discover Hawaii's highest point as you trek up to the 13,803-foot (4,207.3-meter) summit of Mauna Kea. Travel by road to the Onizuka Astronomy Complex, then enjoy a scenic guided hike to the summit, passing international telescopes and panoramic viewpoints. Arrive at the top of the volcano in time to watch the sunset, then return to Onizuka for a guided star-gazing experience (no telescopes provided).

image.alt: Mauna Kea Arnott's Adventures

item.title: Hawai'i's Volcanoes National Park from Hilo Only
item.description: Hawai’i Volcanoes National Park is a blockbuster sight on the Big Island, but reaching the park from the Hilo port on your own can be time consuming. With this driving tour, save hours with port pickup and head straight to the park’s highlights, including the steam vents and Kilauea Caldera overlook. This leaves enough time to visit the Akatsuka Orchid Gardens, Hilo Coffee Mill, and Mauna Loa macadamia farm.

image.alt: Hawai'i's Volcanoes National Park from Hilo Only

item.title: Secret Jungle Tide Pool - Short Hike - Private
item.description:
This tide pool is my secret. It's off the beaten path. A miracle of nature. We'll use a jungle/lava rock coastal trail. Each way takes 30-40 min (1/2 mile) (10 min. in jungle, 20-30 min. on coast). Only your group will participate. I'll teach you about the pool's ecosystem and the local environment. You'll also have time to explore/relax privately. You control how long we stay at the pool.
- Elevation gain on the hike offers amazing coastal views. Sea turtles are a common sight in the ocean. - The pool is like an infinity pool overlooking cliffs. The water is crystal clear. You'll be alone because this spot is unknown. - The pool is like an an aquarium with fish, hermit crabs, rock crabs, sea cucumbers, shrimp, snails, spaghetti worms, pink coralline algae, seaweed, shells, & cool rocks. - Waves strike the cliffs and shoot water in the air like a blowhole (conditions permitting). A once-in-a-lifetime photo opp. - The pool is calm/safe with a deep (4-7 ft.) & shallow (1-4 ft.) area.

image.alt: Secret Jungle Tide Pool - Short Hike - Private

item.title: Volcanoes National Park Adventure Tour - Hilo Shore Excursion
item.description: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park is famous for its ever-flowing lava and the planet’s most massive active volcano. This tour journeys to top natural landmarks in and around the park. Visit Rainbow Falls, Richardson black sand beach, Historic Banyan Drive, Liliuokalani Gardens, Mauna Loa Macadamia Nut Factory, Akatsuka Orchid Nursery, and the active volcano of Kilauea. You also get the opportunity to walk through a lava tube.

image.alt: Volcanoes National Park Adventure Tour - Hilo Shore Excursion

item.title: Evening Volcano Explorer from Hilo
item.description: There's nowhere better to explore the fascinating world of active volcanism, biological diversity, and past and present Hawaiian culture than on the Big Island. On this tour—led by a park-certified guide—you'll visit Kalapana, a village destroyed by advancing lava, black-sand beaches, and Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. You'll see everything from active volcanic craters to steam vents, gazing deep into Hawaii's wild side at sunset.

image.alt: Evening Volcano Explorer from Hilo

item.title: Maunakea Stellar Explorer HILO
item.description: Hawaii’s natural wonders aren’t only on land and in the sea—the Big Island is also a prime spot from which to admire the wonders of the solar system. This tour is the only one that includes both afternoon solar viewing and nighttime stargazing, accompanied by astronomy experts. Visit Rainbow Falls and the Kaumana lava caves, then explore the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and use a state-of-the-art solar telescope and Dobsonian telescope to spot solar flares, galaxies, star clusters, and planets.

image.alt: Maunakea Stellar Explorer HILO

item.title: Private Shore Excursion Hilo Volcanoes National Park up to 11 PPL
item.description: This fully narrated tour is ideal for families and small groups, thanks to a maximum size of 11 people. Explore Volcanoes National Park with an expert guide and experience the excitement of the number one tour on the Big Island. You'll make stops at the Liliuokalani Japanese Gardens, Hilo town, Thurston Lave Tube, plus Rainbow Falls, and several other Hawaii highlights. Whether you're a first-time visitor or returning to the Big Island for another look, this tour is right for you!

image.alt: Private Shore Excursion Hilo Volcanoes National Park up to 11 PPL

item.title: Big Island Half-Day Tour with Lunch
item.description:
Join us for a half-day adventure tour exploring the Big Island from summit to sea. We'll take you on a captivating journey through Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, home to the world's most active volcano, Kilauea. You'll travel from the visitor center to Kilauea crater for panoramic views of the smoking caldera and steaming volcanic vents, walk inside iconic Nahuku (Thurston Lava Tube), and enjoy lunch at the historic Kilauea Lodge. Afterward, visit Punaluʻu black sand beach , Ending with seeing the picture-perfect scenery of Rainbow Falls.
Please note: This tour is not wheelchair accessible and includes moderate walking, including climbing roughly 15 stairs during the lava tube tour.

image.alt: Big Island Half-Day Tour with Lunch

item.title: Volcanoes Adventure Tour from Hilo
item.description: Embark on an epic adventure on this Volcanoes National Park tour from Hilo. Journey into the largest and most active volcano on earth with your friendly, professional guide, and pay a visit to the Richardson Blacksand Beach. Learn about the incredible landscapes that roll out before you and gain insight into the geological and ecological implications of Mother Nature on this stunning park. See the Akatsuka Orchid Nursery, Rainbow Falls, the Mauna Loa Macadamia Nut Factory and so much more on this memorable tour that hits so many of Hawaii's hot spots.

image.alt: Volcanoes Adventure Tour from Hilo

item.title: Majestic Waterfall Tour
item.description: Experience the Big Island’s lush Hamakua Coast on this half-day excursion. After a convenient hotel pickup, visit top destinations like Akaka Falls State Park, Rainbow Falls, and Richardson Beach Park. Capture memorable photos, watch for Hawiian Green Sea Turtles, and stop by Big Island Candies to satisfy your sweet tooth.

image.alt: Majestic Waterfall Tour

item.title: Hilo Shore Excursion: Visit Volcano, Waterfall, Beach with Lunch
item.description:
Make the most of your shore visit with our half-day adventure tour exploring the Big Island from summit to sea. We'll take you on a memorable journey through Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, home to the world's most active volcano, Kilauea. You'll travel from the visitor center to Kilauea crater for panoramic views of the smoking caldera and steaming volcanic vents, walk inside iconic Nahuku (Thurston Lava Tube), and enjoy lunch at the historic Kilauea Lodge & Restaurant. Afterward, visit Punaluʻu black sand beach and discover the picture-perfect scenery of Rainbow Falls in Hilo.
Please note: This tour is not wheelchair accessible and includes moderate walking, including climbing roughly 15 stairs during the lava tube tour.

image.alt: Hilo Shore Excursion: Visit Volcano, Waterfall, Beach with Lunch

item.title: Elite Volcano Hike From Hilo
item.description: Immerse yourself in Hawaii’s explosive scenery on this guided excursion. Enjoy experiences that include trekking Kilauea’s historic 2018 lava flow, marveling at the steam vents and sulfur banks of Volcano National Park and stopping by Star of the Sea Painted Church in Kalapana.

image.alt: Elite Volcano Hike From Hilo

item.title: Private Tour: Experience Active Kilauea Volcano & Hilo Rainbow Falls
item.description: Escape the bumbling group tours and experience Hawaii’s Big Island in the grandest way—via exclusive private tour to the island’s most beautiful spots. With your guide handling all transport, you’ll explore from the summit of Kilauea (with any luck, it’ll be steaming) to the rainforests of Nahuku, from lava tubes and verdant cliffs to lava fields and more. Customizable to your group, it’s a day built around your Hawaiian desires.

image.alt: Private Tour: Experience Active Kilauea Volcano & Hilo Rainbow Falls

item.title: 5 Hour Custom Private Tour where you can see and do what you want
item.description: Get to know Hilo on a private tour with a local guide. Experience the island exactly how you want to on a custom tour tailored to suit your group. Chose from activities like exploring lava tubes, lush rainforests, tropical waterfalls, and black sand beaches, and then stop off at a macadamia nut factory for samples. Sit back and relax in a private vehicle with hotel pick-up and drop-off included.

image.alt: 5 Hour Custom Private Tour where you can see and do what you want

item.title: Hilo Guided Day Tour by Native Hawaiians
item.description: Tours are lead by Native Hawaiians who know culture, language, environment and hidden gems that we have access to via bloodline. Being that we are a family operated business means super clean vans and honor & pride in our work & attitude to serve our guests at our very best!

image.alt: Hilo Guided Day Tour by Native Hawaiians

item.title: Private VAN Tour Hilo
item.description: Experience your own perfect Hawaiian adventure with a private, 7-hour tour that’s totally customizable. Explore the rugged coastline of the Puna District, or enjoy the sun while strolling a black sand beach. Take in the views from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, feel the spray from the Big Island’s most iconic waterfalls, then watch the ground drop away on the Waipio Valley Lookout. Work with your experienced guide to create the perfect itinerary for your interests, and enjoy the island at your own pace.

image.alt: Private VAN Tour Hilo

item.title: From Big island Kona Private Volcanoes and Waterfalls Tour
item.description:
Explore enchanting sights on the Big Island during this shore excursion exploring Volcanoes National Park, waterfall, black sand beach, and more You'll make stops at Kilauea Crater and Thurston Lave Tube, plus Rainbow Falls and several other Hawaii highlights.
Whether you're a first-time visitor or returning to the Big Island for another look, this tour is right for you. Layers of lava stretch over moonscapes, collect in calderas, and put on an awesome show. A guide, park entrance fees, and round-trip port transport are included.

image.alt: From Big island Kona Private Volcanoes and Waterfalls Tour

item.title: Volcano National Park and Rainbow Fall in Hilo, Hawaii
item.description: On this tour, you will experience the life of the Hilo downtown and the exquisite landscape. For instance, the largest, authentic Edo-style ornamental garden outside of Japan, the largest sandiest beach in the Hilo area, a cookie factory where their ingredients were mostly from the farms on Hawaii Island, and the most iconic attractions-Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.

image.alt: Volcano National Park and Rainbow Fall in Hilo, Hawaii

item.title: From Big island Hilo Private Volcanoes and Waterfalls Tour
item.description:
Explore enchanting sights on the Big Island during this shore excursion exploring Volcanoes National Park, waterfall, black sand beach, and more. You'll make stops at Kilauea Crater and Thurston Lave Tube, plus Rainbow Falls and several other Hawaii highlights.
Whether you're a first time visitor or returning to the Big Island for another look, this tour is right for you. Layers of lava stretch over moonscapes, collect in calderas, and put on an awesome show. A guide, park entrance fees, and round-trip port transport are included. Maximum tour size : 5 persons

image.alt: From Big island Hilo Private Volcanoes and Waterfalls Tour

item.title: From Big island Kona Volcanoes and Waterfalls Shared Tour
item.description:
Explore enchanting sights on the Big Island during this shore excursion exploring Volcanoes National Park, waterfall, black sand beach, and more You'll make stops at Kilauea Crater and Thurston Lave Tube, plus Rainbow Falls and several other Hawaii highlights.
Whether you're a first-time visitor or returning to the Big Island for another look, this tour is right for you. Layers of lava stretch over moonscapes, collect in calderas, and put on an awesome show. A guide, park entrance fees, and round-trip port transport are included. This tour will have a maximum 14 travelers.

image.alt: From Big island Kona Volcanoes and Waterfalls Shared Tour
